sections.heading: Sections, how construed.Sections 30-2715 to 30-2746 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them
30-2715 to 30-2746 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.
sections.text: 30-2715 to 30-2746 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.
